Uses of Interface
org.mrcp4j.server.MrcpRequestHandler

Packages that use MrcpRequestHandler
org.mrcp4j.server Provides interfaces and classes for implementing MRCPv2 servers. 
org.mrcp4j.server.delegator Provides request handlers which delegate MRCPv2 requests to the appropriate request handler method. 
 

Uses of MrcpRequestHandler in org.mrcp4j.server
